validation_password: password must contain at least one uppercase letter (A–Z), at least one lowercase letter (a–z), at least one digit (0–9), at least one special character, and must be between 8 and 64 characters long
validation_email: the entered email address does not match the required format
validation_num_range: value must be between %v and %v inclusive
validation_str_length: length must be between %d and %d characters
validation_invalid_body: the request body has an invalid format
